Uses of Interface
org.cojen.tupl.repl.DirectReplicator.Writer

Packages that use DirectReplicator.Writer 
Package Description
org.cojen.tupl.repl
General-purpose Raft-based replication system, intended for supporting fully replicated databases.

  • Uses of DirectReplicator.Writer in org.cojen.tupl.repl

    Subinterfaces of DirectReplicator.Writer in org.cojen.tupl.repl 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static interface  MessageReplicator.Writer
    Interface called by the group leader for proposing messages.
    static interface  StreamReplicator.Writer
    Interface called by the group leader for proposing messages.
    Methods in org.cojen.tupl.repl that return DirectReplicator.Writer 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    DirectReplicator.Writer DirectReplicator.newWriter()
    Returns a new writer for the leader to write into, or else returns null if the local member isn't the leader.
    DirectReplicator.Writer DirectReplicator.newWriter​(long position)
    Returns a new writer for the leader to write into, or else returns null if the local member isn't the leader.
